author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The Evil Dead horror movie franchise has been on a roll with the release of Evil Dead Rise in 2023 and the announcement of several additional projects. One of these projects, the movie Evil Dead Burn, has officially wrapped production with the first look now revealed. Evil Dead Burn sees yet another young director at [...]

The post ‘Evil Dead Burn’ First Look Revealed As Production Wraps appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Evil Dead Burn’ First Look Revealed As Production Wraps

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
James Wan created some of modern horror’s biggest franchises. This includes Saw, Insidious, and The Conjuring. There were some unsuccessful attempts along the way, however, but that doesn’t make them any less great. Now one of these underrated James Wan horror movies is available for streaming on Peacock. This movie was added to the streaming [...]

The post Underrated James Wan Horror Movie Now Streaming On Peacock appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Underrated James Wan Horror Movie Now Streaming On Peacock
